text: ECFR may refer to: * East County Fire & Rescue, a public safety provider in Clark County, Washington. * Electronic Code of Federal Regulations (e-CFR). * Enka-Candler Fire & Rescue, a public safety provider near Asheville, North Carolina. * European Council for Fatwa and Research, a private foundation composed of Islamic clerics and scholars. * European Council on Foreign Relations, a pan-European foreign policy think tank.
title: ECFR
